content.raw:
Open model editor
Create a shape
Select shape and copy using CTRL-C
Paste using CTRL-V, but don't place the shape--press escape the cancel
Press CTRL-V again.

Instead of pasting the original shape, nothing will happen, and gzerr prints the following:

```
[Err] [Visual.cc:479] Unable to create a mesh from unit_cylinder
[Err] [Visual.cc:478] Ogre Error:OGRE EXCEPTION(4:ItemIdentityException): An object of type 'Entity' with name 'VISUAL_unit_cylinder_1_clone_visual_0' already exists. in SceneManager::createMovableObject at /build/buildd/ogre-1.8-1.8.1+dfsg/OgreMain/src/OgreSceneManager.cpp (line 6783)
```
content.html:
Open model editor Create a shape Select shape and copy using CTRL-C Paste using CTRL-V, but don't place the shape--press escape the cancel Press CTRL-V again.

Instead of pasting the original shape, nothing will happen, and gzerr prints the following:

[Err] [Visual.cc:479] Unable to create a mesh from unit_cylinder
[Err] [Visual.cc:478] Ogre Error:OGRE EXCEPTION(4:ItemIdentityException): An object of type 'Entity' with name 'VISUAL_unit_cylinder_1_clone_visual_0' already exists. in SceneManager::createMovableObject at /build/buildd/ogre-1.8-1.8.1+dfsg/OgreMain/src/OgreSceneManager.cpp (line 6783)
